project_title: Capacity Forecasting and Strategic Insights for Bars, Pubs, Cafes, and Restaurants in Melbourne
description: An end-to-end data science pipeline to forecast venue patron capacities using time-series and ensemble modeling, and deliver interactive geospatial dashboards for stakeholder decision-making.

datasets.name: City of Melbourne Venue Data
datasets.description: Location, capacity, and type information for hospitality venues in Melbourne
datasets.source: City of Melbourne Open Data API

datasets.name: Historical Patron Counts
datasets.description: Weekly and daily venue occupancy records

datasets.name: Bureau of Meteorology Weather Data
datasets.description: Local weather variables (temperature, humidity) for Melbourne
